XPTable.Title: Experience Progression Table
XPTable.CumulativeHint: Cumulative XP requirement from all levels.
XPTable.PercentHint: Percentage increase of the per level XP

Info.SpellsShowPrepared:
All spells.
Click to show prepared only
Info.SpellsShowAll:
Prepared only.
Click to show all spells
Info.Thacoh: Approximate minimum roll needed to be hit.

Settings.IgnoreActorTypesHint: Do not do full processing for these types, ignoring problems and recommendations.

UI.PopTabHint: Right click to popout the tab in separate window.

QuickSkills.Title: Quick Skills
QuickSkills.AutoSelectHint: Set the values to 0 to disable the criteria. If both are enabled, both criteria must be satisfied.
QuickSkills.UseMaxMod: Use max modifier ({maxMod}) instead max rank ({maxRank}) for percentage.
QuickSkills.HelpText:
‚Äì Star indicates skills that are enabled by default if unconfigured.
‚Äì Auto selection is for showing skills based on their rank or modifier meeting a threshold of some kind instead of explicit selection.
‚Äì Bolding indicates skills that are chosen by auto selection thresholds.

Reset.Title: Hard reset skill configuration?
Reset.Info:
Do you wish to fully reset the configuration?
This removes the configuration fully and can not be undone.
Reset.Soft: Skills reset. Configuration not yet saved.

Warning.RefreshNeeded: Little Helper ü¶é settings change requires refresh to fully take effect.
Warning.RunInOperator: Includes run-in operator [- + / *] that may cause roll evaluation to fail.
Warning.ExcessSpacing: Excess spacing between parens containing function parameters or flavour.
Warning.FreeLetters: String that is neither variable nor function
Warning.TooManySlotItems:
Too many items of the same slot type in use.
You have {used} out of {limit} possible.
Warning.TooFewLanguages:
Too few languages.
Should know at least {granted}.
{missing} missing.
Warning.NoShieldWithTwohanded: Two-handed weapons are not usable with light shield or heavier normally.
Warning.SyncNoSource: No source ID to synchronize with.

GM.SceneScaleMismatch: Scene scale set to "{scale} {units}" and does not match chosen system of units.

Bright.Hint: Bright light emitted by this token visible to all.

Dim.Hint: Dim light emitted by this token visible to all.

BenchPressing.Disclaimer:
Expected values are for average track on the bench-pressing table.
If you don't know the significance of these numbers, ignore them.

Scene.LackingVision: One or more tokens [{count}] lack vision.
Scene.LackingVisionGM: Scene Token Vision enabled, but one or more player tokens [{count}] have no vision.

Conditions.bleed:
Losing endless rivers of blood.
No other effects.

Might stop with:
- DC 10 stabilization check
- DC 15 Heal check
Conditions.blind:
-4 penalty to Str and Dex-based skill checks and sight-based Perception checks.

DC 10 Acrobatics to move faster than half-speed or risk falling prone.

All opponents are effectively invisible.
Conditions.burrow:
Untargetable by anything that doesn't go through solid objects if fully immersed.

Effectively blind without tremorsense or similar sense that passes through solid objects.
Conditions.burning:
You're on fire!

At start of your turn roll DC 15 Reflex save to stop burning; on failure you take 1d6 damage.

Rolling on the ground or smothering the fire gives second save with +4 bonus to end the fire.
Conditions.confused:
d% to determine behaviour:
* 01 ‚Äì 25 : Act normally.
* 25 ‚Äì 50 : Do nothing.
* 51 ‚Äì 75 : Deal 1d8+Str to self.
* 76 ‚Äì 100 : Attack nearest creature.
Conditions.cowering:
Unable to act

-2 penalty to AC
Lose Dex to  AC
Conditions.dazzled: -1 penalty to Attacks and Sight-based Perception.
Conditions.deaf:
-4 penalty to Initiative checks.
Automatically fail hearing based Perception checks.
-4 penalty on Perception Checks.

20% chance to fail verbal spells.
Conditions.entangled:
-2 penalty to Attack rolls
-4 penalty to Dex

Must concentrate to cast somatic spells.

Prevents movement if anchored.
Conditions.exhausted:
-6 penalty to Str and Dex

Move at half speed.
Can not run or charge.
Conditions.fatigued:
-2 penalty to Str and Dex

Can not run or charge.
Conditions.frightened:
-2 penalty to attacks, saves, skill checks, and ability checks.

Must escape and use abilties if necessary to do so.

Worsens to panicked, lessens to shaken.
Conditions.fly:
Immune to pressure plates and tremorsense.

Likely requires fly checks to avoid falling.

Heavily affected by windy weather.
Conditions.grappled:
-4 penalty to Dexterity
-2 penalty to attack rolls, CMB, except to grapple or escape it.

Can take no actions requiring two hands.
Somatic spells require concentration check.
Conditions.helpless:
Dex is set to 0

Paralyzed, sleeping, bound, held, unconscious, or otherwise completely at opponent's mercy.
Conditions.hover:
Immune to pressure plates and tremorsense.

This is NOT the hover action for flying.
Conditions.incorporeal:
Immune to non-magical attacks.

Take only 50% of damage.
Full damage from incorporeal creatures and force effects.
Conditions.invisible:
+2 bonus to attack rolls against sighted enemies.
Target is denied Dex to AC.

Full concealment against sighted enemies (50% miss chance).
Conditions.nauseated:
Can take only single move action per turn and nothing else.

Can not attack, cast spells, concentrate, or do anything else requiring attention.
Conditions.panicked:
-2 penalty on saves, skill checks and ability checks.

Can not attack.
Must drop all held items.
Must escape and use abilties if necessary to do so.
Can take total defense if unable to escape.

Lessens to frightened.
Conditions.paralyzed:
Str and Dex are set to 0.

Unable to act, but can do purely mental tasks.
Conditions.pinned:
Lose Dex to AC
-4 penalty to AC.
Conditions.prone:
+4 bonus to AC against ranged attacks.
-4 penalty to AC against melee attacks.
-4 penalty on melee attacks.

Can not attack with ranged weapons except crossbows.
Conditions.shaken:
-2 penalty to attacks, saves, skill checks, and ability checks.

Worsens to frightened.
Conditions.sickened: -2 penalty to attacks, weapon damage, saves, skill checks, and ability checks.
Conditions.staggered:
Can only take standard action.

Reminder: 5-foot step is nonaction.
Can also take free, swift and immediate actions.
Conditions.stunned:
-2 penalty to AC.
Lose Dex to AC.

Can not take any actions.

Drop anything held.
Conditions.sleep:
Helpless & unaware.
Effectively blinded.

+10 to perception check DCs.
Conditions.squeezing:
-4 penalty to AC
-4 penalty to Attacks
Movement speed is halved

If squeezing into narrower space than half your space's width:
- Lose Dex to AC
- Can't attack
- Need Escape Artist to move
Conditions.swim: Requires swim checks to move without swim movement speed.
Conditions.disabled:
On the brink of consciousness.

Implies staggered.
Conditions.dying:
Losing blood!

DC 10 Heal check to stabilize.
Con check (DC 10 - HP) to self-stabilize.
Conditions.flatFooted:
Has not yet acted in combat.

Lose dexterity to AC.
Conditions.petrified:
Helpless and unconscious.

Lose Dex to AC.
Conditions.stable:
Unconscious but alive.

Can try DC 10 Con check per hour to gain consciousness and shift to disabled.

If you haven't received help, must stabilize every hour to not lose 1 hp.

natural-reach-display.Label: Display Natural Reach
natural-reach-display.Hint: Displays natural reach in attributes tab with stature.

new-actor-guide.Label: New Actor Guide
new-actor-guide.Hint: Displays simple hints for what a character has not yet configured.

missing-bits.Label: Missing Bits
missing-bits.Hint: Add warnings about missing bits, such as too few languages, no proficiencies, lacking FCB, unused spells, missing traits, skill point mismatch, and feat mismatch.

duplicate-slots.Label: Slot Issues (Duplicate & Unused)
duplicate-slots.Hint: Warn about item slot issues and display list of unused slots at bottom of the slotted item category. Supports only default humanoid configuration.

excess-skill-ranks.Label: Excess Skill Ranks
excess-skill-ranks.Hint: Display warning when skill ranks exceed their possible maximum.

creature-type-info.Label: Humanoid?
creature-type-info.Hint: Display simple statement if character is humanoid near quadruped toggle.

actor-sheet-condition-durations.Label: Condition Durations
actor-sheet-condition-durations.Hint: Display condition duration in buffs tab and update it when world time progresses.

buff-tooltips.Label: Buff Tooltips
buff-tooltips.Hint: Tooltips for buffs that display more detailed info on duration. Requires buff to be active.

actor-token-name.Label: Token Name
actor-token-name.Hint: Display token name near actor name if it's different.

actor-token-mismatch.Label: Token Image Mismatch
actor-token-mismatch.Hint: Display little marker when portrait does not match token image.

enhanced-language-selection.Label: Enhanced Language Selector
enhanced-language-selection.Hint: Clarify language selector by making common languages stand out and give categories with icons to everything.

quick-roller.Label: Quick Roll
quick-roller.Hint: Displays roll button on check chat messages to quickly roll the same check.

card-hints.Label: Check Hint Labels
card-hints.Hint: Display extra hints for various checks, such as common DCs.

xp-chart.Label: XP Chart
xp-chart.Hint: Experience progression chart for the experience config dialog.

CardHints.DoorDCHint: Door DC varies from less than zero to around 30. Good luck.
CardHints.ContinuousDamageHint: Continuous damage counts for only half.
CardHints.TumbleDCHint: CMD+5 for moving through occupied space.
CardHints.FeintDCHint: DC 10 + (BAB + Wis) or (Sense Motive), whichever is better.
CardHints.HealDeadlyDCHint: +2 DC per missing healer's kit charge
CardHints.UMDScrollMaxLevelHint:
Ignores need for emulated ability score.
Base DC = 20 + Spell Level
CardHints.CommonKnowledgeHint: Any common knowledge is DC 5 to 10 range.
CardHints.KnowledgeBaseDCHint: Base DC usually ranges from 15 to 30 plus CR or level of the thing.
CardHints.SwimSpeedHint: Quarter speed as move action. Half as full-round.
CardHints.ClimbSpeedHint: Quarter speed as move action. Half as full-round.
CardHints.FastClimbHint: By accepting -5 penalty before roll, you can move at half-speed instead of quarter.
